pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā opapātiko hoti tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā
bhonto sattā kāyaduccaritena samannāgatā vacīduccaritena samannāgatā manoduccaritena samannāgatā ariyānaṃ upavādakā
bhonto sattā kāyasucaritena samannāgatā vacīsucaritena samannāgatā manosucaritena samannāgatā ariyānaṃ anupavādakā
bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca ko nu kho bhante hetu ko paccayo
telapajjota dhāreti cakkhumant rūpa dakkhantīti evamevaṃ bhotā gotama anekapariyāyena dhamma
jātiyā jarāya maraṇa soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsa dukkhotiṇṇa dukkhapareta
ekamantaṃ nisinna kho so bhikkhu bhagavant etadavoca ko nu kho
bheda paraṃ maraṇa sugatiṃ sagga loka upapannāti iti dibba cakkhu
te kāya bheda paraṃ maraṇa sugatiṃ sagga loka upapannāti iti
bhiyyobhāva vepulla bhāvanā pāripūriyā chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriya ārabhati citta
soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsa dukkhotiṇṇa dukkhapareta appeva nāma imassa
anussarati seyyathidaṃ ekampi jāti dvepi jātiyo tissopi jātiyo catassopi jātiyo
ca vāyāma ca ussāha ca ussoḷhī ca appaṭivānī ca sati
bhikkhu sabrahmacārī piya ca hoti manāpa ca garu ca bhāvanīya
paraṃ maraṇa sugatiṃ sagga loka upapannāti iti dibba cakkhu visuddha
nisinna kho so bhikkhu bhagavant etadavoca ko nu kho bhante
andhakāra vā telapajjota dhāreti cakkhumant rūpa dakkhantīti evamevaṃ bhotā gotama

kho bhikkhave sati kiṃ upādāya kiṃ abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati
ime vā pana bhonto sattā kāyasucarita samannāgata vacīsucarita samannāgata manosucarita
vinipāta niraya upapanna ime vā pana bhonto sattā kāyasucarita samannāgata
pana bhonto sattā kāyasucarita samannāgata vacīsucarita samannāgata manosucarita samannāgata ariya

vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā nisīdati pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ
cittaṃ vimuccati bhavāsavāpi cittaṃ vimuccati avijjāsavāpi cittaṃ vimuccati vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti
chandasamādhippadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti vīriyasamādhi pe cittasamādhi pe vīmaṃsāsamādhippadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti
cittaṃ vimuccati vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ hoti khīṇā jāti vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ
bhikkhave sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ
atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā
dhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ tassa saṃvarāya paṭipajjati rakkhati manindriyaṃ manindriye saṃvaraṃ āpajjati
cattāro idha bhikkhave bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā
saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetu yamahaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto
pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ tassa saṃvarāya paṭipajjati rakkhati manindriyaṃ manindriye
upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharati tathā dutiyaṃ tathā tatiyaṃ
suññāgāragato vā nisīdati pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya parimukhaṃ satiṃ
rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā nisīdati pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya
desetu yamahaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto
bālo abyatto asappuriso khataṃ upahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati sāvajjo ca hoti
jetavanaṃ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi
upahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati sāvajjo ca hoti sānuvajjo ca viññūnaṃ bahuñca
kevalakappaṃ jetavanaṃ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ
saddaṃ sutvā ghānena gandhaṃ ghāyitvā jivhāya rasaṃ sāyitvā kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṃ
upapajjeyyanti so taṃ cittaṃ dahati taṃ cittaṃ adhiṭṭhāti taṃ cittaṃ
asuci mucci pe asuci na mucci tassa kukkuccaṃ ahosi pe
sabbāvantaṃ lokaṃ upekkhāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena pharitvā
anagāriyaṃ pabbajito hoti otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi
agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito hoti otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi
kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ
paṇḍito viyatto sappuriso akkhataṃ anupahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati anavajjo ca hoti
hīnaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā yaṃ dūre santike vā sabbaṃ rūpaṃ

katame cattāro idha bhikkhave bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno
pe asuci na mucci tassa kukkuccaṃ ahosi pe anāpatti bhikkhu

viññāṇaṃ bhavissatīti evañhi te gahapati sikkhitabbaṃ tasmātiha te gahapati evaṃ
manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā tañce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati
so taṃ cittaṃ dahati taṃ cittaṃ adhiṭṭhāti taṃ cittaṃ bhāveti

sāraṇīya piyakaraṇa garukaraṇa saṅgaha avivāda sāmaggiyā ekībhāva saṃvattati puna caparaṃ
imesaṃ kho bhikkhave pañcannaṃ uddhambhāgiya saṃyojana abhiññāya pariññāya parikkhaya pahāna
paṇīta vā yaṃ dūre santike vā sabbaṃ viññāṇa netaṃ mama
manasā dhamma viññāya na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ manindriya asaṃvuta
bhavo bhavapaccayā jāti jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā sambhavati evametassa kevala dukkhakkhandha
kāya bheda paraṃ maraṇa sugatiṃ sagga loka upapajjati te aññe
pe yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayita sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukha
dhamma samannāgata bhikkhu āhuneyya hoti pāhuneyya dakkhiṇeyya añjalikaraṇīya anuttara puññakkhetta
bhavanirodha bhavanirodha jātinirodha jātinirodha jarāmaraṇa sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā nirujjhati evametassa kevala dukkhakkhandha
ko nu kho imassa bhagavatā saṃkhittena uddesa uddiṭṭha vitthārena atthaṃ
sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti
citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte sattānaṃ
upādānanirodhā bhavanirodho bhavanirodhā jātinirodho jātinirodhā jarāmaraṇaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā nirujjhanti evametassa kevalassa
jātiyo cattālīsampi jātiyo paññāsampi jātiyo jātisatampi jātisahassampi jātisatasahassampi anekepi saṃvaṭṭakappe
mama nesohamasmi na meso attāti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṃ evametaṃ
imesaṃ kho bhikkhave pañcannaṃ uddhambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ abhiññāya pariññāya parikkhayāya pahānāya
jānato evaṃ passato kāmāsavāpi cittaṃ vimuccati bhavāsavāpi cittaṃ vimuccati avijjāsavāpi
evaṃ passato kāmāsavāpi cittaṃ vimuccati bhavāsavāpi cittaṃ vimuccati avijjāsavāpi cittaṃ
kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā tañce bhikkhu nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya
sāraṇīyo piyakaraṇo garukaraṇo saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyā ekībhāvāya saṃvattati puna caparaṃ
anāpatti bhikkhu saṅghādisesassa āpatti thullaccayassāti tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa
kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti sādhu kho
paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti te aññe deve dasahi
taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīranti vā aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīranti vā
sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti sādhu
sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti te
viharati vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā ajjhattaṃ sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāvaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ
bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ pe saccaṃ kira tumhe
saṃvarāya paṭipajjati rakkhati cakkhundriyaṃ cakkhundriye saṃvaraṃ āpajjati sotena saddaṃ sutvā
sāvatthinidānaṃ cattārome bhikkhave jhāyī katame cattāro idha bhikkhave ekacco jhāyī
nu kho imassa bhagavatā saṃkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa
sammādiṭṭhi hoti ujugatāssa diṭṭhi dhamme aveccappasādena samannāgato āgato imaṃ saddhammanti
kho imassa bhagavatā saṃkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena
dhammo sāraṇīyo piyakaraṇo garukaraṇo saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyā ekībhāvāya saṃvattati puna
tiṃsampi jātiyo cattālīsampi jātiyo paññāsampi jātiyo jātisatampi jātisahassampi jātisatasahassampi anekepi
vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā evañca pana bhikkhave nissajjitabbaṃ pe
tassa saṃvarāya paṭipajjati rakkhati cakkhundriyaṃ cakkhundriye saṃvaraṃ āpajjati sotena saddaṃ
yadidaṃ cattāri purisayugāni aṭṭha purisapuggalā esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho āhuneyyo pāhuneyyo
akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ tassa saṃvarāya paṭipajjati rakkhati cakkhundriyaṃ cakkhundriye saṃvaraṃ
aṭṭha purisapuggalā esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho āhuneyyo pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṃ
cattārome bhikkhave jhāyī katame cattāro idha bhikkhave ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṃ
iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā tañce bhikkhu nābhinandati nābhivadati
uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajituṃ yaṃnūna mayaṃ
cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantīti evamevaṃ bhotā gotamena anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito esāhaṃ
uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajituṃ yaṃnūna mayaṃ yenāyasmā
nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ manindriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ viharantaṃ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā
bhagavatā saṃkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajeyyāti
iti rūpaṃ iti rūpassa samudayo iti rūpassa atthaṅgamo iti vedanā
na kilamati na paridevati na urattāḷiṃ kandati na sammohaṃ āpajjati
sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhi ayaṃ kho
purisapuggalā esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho āhuneyyo pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ
tassa evaṃ jānato evaṃ passato kāmāsavāpi cittaṃ vimuccati bhavāsavāpi cittaṃ
purisapuggalo paṭisaṃvedeti sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā sabbaṃ taṃ
lokaṃ upapajjanti te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti dibbena āyunā
pariyāpuṇāti suttaṃ geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ gāthaṃ udānaṃ itivuttakaṃ jātakaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ vedallaṃ
svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo sandiṭṭhiko akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṃ veditabbo viññūhīti
hoti itipi natthi paro loko natthi sattā opapātikā natthi sukatadukkaṭānaṃ
bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti te aññe deve
hīnaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā yaṃ dūre santike vā sabbaṃ viññāṇaṃ
paribbājako yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodi sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ
bhavanirodhā jātinirodho jātinirodhā jarāmaraṇaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā nirujjhanti evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho
bhavanirodho bhavanirodhā jātinirodho jātinirodhā jarāmaraṇaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā nirujjhanti evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa
anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ pe saccaṃ kira tumhe bhikkhave
dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno sammā virajjamāno sammā vimuccamāno sammā pariyantadassāvī
tenupasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi nisajja kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi
manasā dhammaṃ viññāya na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ manindriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ

vā yaṃ dūre santike vā sabbaṃ viññāṇaṃ netaṃ mama nesohamasmi

vā paṇītaṃ vā yaṃ dūre santike vā sabbaṃ viññāṇaṃ netaṃ

manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā tañce bhikkhu nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati
bhikkhu saṅghādisesassa āpatti thullaccayassāti tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno
atha kho bhikkhave vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi kimhi nu kho asati
na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ manindriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ viharantaṃ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā
atha kho bhikkhave vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi kimhi nu kho sati
evaṃ avaca mā bhagavantaṃ abbhācikkhi na hi sādhu bhagavato abbhakkhānaṃ
ce pavesanaṃ sādiyati paviṭṭhaṃ sādiyati ṭhitaṃ sādiyati uddharaṇaṃ sādiyati āpatti

vijjā adhigatā avijjā vihatā vijjā uppannā tamo vihato āloko uppanno
na meso attāti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṃ evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya
saṃkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajituṃ yaṃnūna
nesohamasmi na meso attāti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṃ evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ
maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi
evañhi te gahapati sikkhitabbaṃ tasmātiha te gahapati evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ na
kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti te aññe
paṇītaṃ vā yaṃ dūre santike vā sabbaṃ viññāṇaṃ netaṃ mama

socati na kilamati na paridevati na urattāḷiṃ kandati na sammohaṃ

pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte sattānaṃ cutūpapātañāṇāya cittaṃ
anvāssaveyyuṃ tassa saṃvarāya paṭipajjati rakkhati cakkhundriyaṃ cakkhundriye saṃvaraṃ āpajjati sotena

hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ manindriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ viharantaṃ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā
pe yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ
vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmiṃ
nānubyañjanaggāhī yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ viharantaṃ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ
saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti dibbena
upasampajja viharati vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā ajjhattaṃ sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāvaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ
parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇāya cittaṃ
dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ
ko nu kho imassa bhagavatā saṃkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ
adhigatā avijjā vihatā vijjā uppannā tamo vihato āloko uppanno yathā
parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte sattānaṃ cutūpapātañāṇāya
so ce pavesanaṃ sādiyati paviṭṭhaṃ sādiyati ṭhitaṃ sādiyati uddharaṇaṃ sādiyati
manoviññeyyā dhammā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā tañce bhikkhu
abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ tassa saṃvarāya paṭipajjati rakkhati manindriyaṃ
evamevaṃ bhotā gotama anekapariyāyena dhamma pakāsita esāhaṃ bhavantaṃ gotama saraṇa
mayā bhaṇitanti vinidhāya diṭṭhiṃ vinidhāya khantiṃ vinidhāya ruci vinidhāya bhāva
yampi bhikkhave tathāgata purima jāti purima bhavaṃ purima niketa pubbe
cakkhuviññeyya rūpā iṭṭha kantā manāpa piyarūpa kāmūpasaṃhita rajanīya sotaviññeyya sadda
cakkhu rūpa disvā na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ cakkhundriya asaṃvuta
jāyati pītimana kāyo passambhati passaddhakāya sukhaṃ vedeti sukhī citta samādhiyati
anissita ca viharati na ca kiñci loka upādiyati evampi kho
kusalābhisanda sukhassāhāro sovaggika sukhavipāka saggasaṃvattanika iṭṭha kantāya manāpa hitāya sukhāya
bhagavatā bhikkhu sikkhāpada paññatta hoti tena kho pana samaya bhikkhū
bhikkhu vitakkavicārā vūpasama ajjhattaṃ sampasādana cetaso ekodibhāva avitakka avicāra samādhija
bhavantaṃ gotama saraṇa gacchati dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca upāsaka maṃ bhavaṃ gotama
majjhekalyāṇa pariyosānakalyāṇa sāttha sabyañjana kevalaparipuṇṇa parisuddha brahmacariyaṃ pakāseti sādhu kho
gotama saraṇa gacchati dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca upāsaka maṃ bhavaṃ gotama dhāretu
viññāya na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ manindriya asaṃvuta viharantaṃ abhijjhādomanassa
vācāya vācāya pācittiya upasampanna upasampanna sutvā upasampanna pesuñña upasaṃharati itthannāma
hoti yāvadeva ñāṇamattāya paṭissatimattāya anissita ca viharati na ca kiñci
pamudita pīti jāyati pītimana kāyo passambhati passaddhakāya sukhaṃ vedeti sukhī
ahosi pe anāpatti bhikkhu pārājika āpatti thullaccayassāti tena kho pana
assutavant puthujjana ariya adassāvī ariyadhamma akovida ariyadhamma avinīta sappurisa adassāvī
tassa kukkucca ahosi pe anāpatti bhikkhu pārājika āpatti thullaccayassāti tena
idha bhikkhave ariyasāvaka buddha aveccappasāda samannāgata hoti itipi so bhagavā
iddhividhā paccanubhoti ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti bahudhāpi hutvā eka hoti
anekavihita iddhividhā paccanubhoti ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti bahudhāpi hutvā eka
rūpa disvā na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ cakkhundriya asaṃvuta viharantaṃ
kevalaparipuṇṇa parisuddha brahmacariyaṃ pakāseti sādhu kho pana tathārūpa arahataṃ dassana
pallaṅkena kamati seyyathāpi pakkhī sakuṇa imepi candimasūriyā evaṃmahiddhika evaṃmahānubhāva pāṇinā
pariyosānakalyāṇa sāttha sabyañjana kevalaparipuṇṇa parisuddha brahmacariyaṃ pakāseti sādhu kho pana
brahmacariyaṃ carituṃ yaṃnūnāhaṃ kesamassu ohāretvā kāsāya vattha acchādetvā agāra anagāriyaṃ
sattā kāya bheda paraṃ maraṇa apāyaṃ duggati vinipāta niraya upapajjati
bhikkhave tathāgata purima jāti purima bhavaṃ purima niketa pubbe manussabhūta
bhagavato etadahosi idaṃ kho no āvuso bhagavā saṃkhittena uddesaṃ uddisitvā
sāvatthī viharati jetavana anāthapiṇḍika ārāma tena kho pana samaya thullanandā
sati paccupaṭṭhita hoti yāvadeva ñāṇamattāya paṭissatimattāya anissita ca viharati na
yaṃ kiñcāyaṃ purisapuggala paṭisaṃvedeti sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukha vā
yaṃnūnāhaṃ kesamassu ohāretvā kāsāya vattha acchādetvā agāra anagāriyaṃ pabbajeyyanti so
acirapakkanta bhagavato etadahosi idaṃ kho no āvuso bhagavā saṃkhittena uddesaṃ
kho bhikkhave sati rūpa upādāya rūpa abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati
dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca upāsaka maṃ bhavaṃ gotama dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupeta saraṇa
paccupaṭṭhita hoti yāvadeva ñāṇamattāya paṭissatimattāya anissita ca viharati na ca
hoti tathāgata paraṃ maraṇāti vā neva hoti na na hoti
puññābhisanda kusalābhisanda sukhassāhāro sovaggika sukhavipāka saggasaṃvattanika iṭṭha kantāya manāpa hitāya
paṭipucchati yathā te khameyya tathā naṃ byākaroti taṃ kiṃ maññati
yāvadeva ñāṇamattāya paṭissatimattāya anissita ca viharati na ca kiñci loka
saraṇa gacchati dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca upāsaka maṃ bhavaṃ gotama dhāretu ajjatagge
kevalaparipuṇṇa parisuddha brahmacariyaṃ abhivadanti tathārūpāssa dhamma bahussuta honti dhātā vacasā
puthujjana ariya adassāvī ariyadhamma akovida ariyadhamma avinīta sappurisa adassāvī sappurisadhamma
ajjhāvasatā ekantaparipuṇṇa ekantaparisuddha saṅkhalikhita brahmacariyaṃ carituṃ yaṃnūnāhaṃ kesamassu ohāretvā kāsāya
upādānanirodha upādānanirodha bhavanirodha bhavanirodha jātinirodha jātinirodha jarāmaraṇa sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā nirujjhati evametassa
moha kodha upanāha makkha paḷāsa macchariya pāpikā issā pāpikā icchā
āvusoti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputta paccassosi āyasmā sāriputta etadavoca
rūpa kho bhikkhave sati rūpa upādāya rūpa abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi
samannāgamanahetu kho mārisa moggallāna evamidhekacca sattā kāya bheda paraṃ maraṇa
bhagavāti vigarahi buddha bhagavā pe kathañhi nāma bhikkhave chabbaggiya bhikkhunī
adassāvī ariyadhamma akovida ariyadhamma avinīta sappurisa adassāvī sappurisadhamma akovida sappurisadhamma
sāratthika sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṃ caramāna mahato rukkha tiṭṭhanta sāravant atikkammeva sāra
ñāṇamattāya paṭissatimattāya anissita ca viharati na ca kiñci loka upādiyati
etadahosi idaṃ kho no āvuso bhagavā saṃkhittena uddesaṃ uddisitvā vitthārena
musā mayā bhaṇitanti vinidhāya diṭṭhiṃ vinidhāya khantiṃ vinidhāya ruci vinidhāya
tathāgata paraṃ maraṇāti vā neva hoti na na hoti tathāgata
atha kho te bhikkhū chabbaggiya bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ
so dibba cakkhu visuddha atikkantamānusaka satta passati cavamāna upapajjamāna hīna
taṇhāpaccayā upādāna upādānapaccayā bhavo bhavapaccayā jāti jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā sambhavati
ekantaparisuddha saṅkhalikhita brahmacariyaṃ carituṃ yaṃnūnāhaṃ kesamassu ohāretvā kāsāya vattha acchādetvā
neva hoti na na hoti tathāgata paraṃ maraṇa idameva saccaṃ
ekantaparipuṇṇa ekantaparisuddha saṅkhalikhita brahmacariyaṃ carituṃ yaṃnūnāhaṃ kesamassu ohāretvā kāsāya vattha
bhikkhu anuppanna pāpaka akusala dhamma anuppāda chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriya
ariya adassāvī ariyadhamma akovida ariyadhamma avinīta sappurisa adassāvī sappurisadhamma akovida
carituṃ yaṃnūnāhaṃ kesamassu ohāretvā kāsāya vattha acchādetvā agāra anagāriyaṃ pabbajeyyanti
bhaṇatīti āpatti vācāya vācāya pācittiya upasampanna upasampanna sutvā upasampanna pesuñña
panassa sati paccupaṭṭhita hoti yāvadeva ñāṇamattāya paṭissatimattāya anissita ca viharati
saccaṃ bhagavāti vigarahi buddha bhagavā pe kathañhi nāma bhikkhave chabbaggiya
sammodanīya kathaṃ sāraṇīya vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi ekamantaṃ nisinna kho te
pathavī ākāsepi pallaṅkena kamati seyyathāpi pakkhī sakuṇa imepi candimasūriyā evaṃmahiddhika
idaṃ kho no āvuso bhagavā saṃkhittena uddesaṃ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṃ
gacchati dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca upāsaka maṃ bhavaṃ gotama dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupeta
kho te bhikkhū chabbaggiya bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesi
samaya buddha bhagavā rājagaha viharati veḷuvana kalandakanivāpa tena kho pana
pīti jāyati pītimana kāyo passambhati passaddhakāya sukhaṃ vedeti sukhī citta
vā panassa sati paccupaṭṭhita hoti yāvadeva ñāṇamattāya paṭissatimattāya anissita ca
paṭissatimattāya anissita ca viharati na ca kiñci loka upādiyati evampi
na socati na kilamati na paridevati na urattāḷiṃ kandati na
āsabha ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti parisā sīhanāda nadati brahmacakka pavatteti puna caparaṃ
yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavant abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu ekamantaṃ ṭhita
ariyadhamma akovida ariyadhamma avinīta sappurisa adassāvī sappurisadhamma akovida sappurisadhamma avinīta
buddha bhagavā rājagaha viharati veḷuvana kalandakanivāpa tena kho pana samaya
sukara agāra ajjhāvasatā ekantaparipuṇṇa ekantaparisuddha saṅkhalikhita brahmacariyaṃ carituṃ yaṃnūnāhaṃ kesamassu
ādikalyāṇa majjhekalyāṇa pariyosānakalyāṇa sāttha sabyañjana kevalaparipuṇṇa parisuddha brahmacariyaṃ pakāseti sādhu

hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti
atha kho te bhikkhū chabbaggiye bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ
carituṃ yaṃnūnāhaṃ kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajeyyanti
pe anāpatti bhikkhu pārājikassa āpatti thullaccayassāti tena kho pana samayena
evameva kho bhikkhave bhikkhu ariya aṭṭhaṅgika maggaṃ bhāventa ariya aṭṭhaṅgika
pe upekkhāsahagata cetasā eka disaṃ pharitvā viharati tathā dutiyaṃ tathā
ca panāyasmanto sāmaññatthañca brahmaññatthañca diṭṭheva dhamma sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja
cakkhuviññeyya rūpā iṭṭha kantā manāpa piyarūpa kāmūpasaṃhita rajanīya tañce bhikkhu
janeti vāyamati vīriya ārabhati citta paggaṇhāti padahati uppanna pāpaka akusala
niccaṃ vā anicca vāti anicca bhante pe api nu taṃ
na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ cakkhundriya asaṃvuta viharantaṃ abhijjhādomanassa pāpaka
ānanda tenupasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā āyasmant ānanda saddhiṃ sammodi sammodanīya kathaṃ sāraṇīya
asajjamāna gacchati seyyathāpi ākāse pathaviyāpi ummujjanimujjā karoti seyyathāpi udaka udakepi
kathañca bhikkhave bhikkhu ariya aṭṭhaṅgika maggaṃ bhāventa ariya aṭṭhaṅgika maggaṃ
tathāgata paraṃ maraṇāti vā na hoti tathāgata paraṃ maraṇāti vā
na jāyati na jīyati na mīyati na cavati na upapajjati
hetaṃ bhante vedanā saññā saṅkhāra viññāṇa niccaṃ vā anicca vāti
bhante seyyathāpi bhante nikkujjita vā ukkujjeyya paṭicchanna vā vivarati mūḷha
me dukkha vedanā abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti abhikkamosānaṃ paññāyati no paṭikkamo
vācāya pācittiya upasampanna upasampanna sutvā upasampanna pesuñña upasaṃharati itthannāma taṃ
na ca hoti tathāgata paraṃ maraṇāti vā neva hoti na
puna caparaṃ udāyī akkhātā mayā sāvaka paṭipadā yathāpaṭipanna me sāvaka
ca na ca hoti tathāgata paraṃ maraṇāti vā neva hoti
panāyasmanto sāmaññatthañca brahmaññatthañca diṭṭheva dhamma sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharantīti
sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatana samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodha upasampajja viharati paññāya cassa disvā āsavā
idha bhikkhave bhikkhu chandasamādhippadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgata iddhipāda bhāveti vīriyasamādhi pe cittasamādhi pe
upasaṅkamitvā āyasmant ānanda saddhiṃ sammodi sammodanīya kathaṃ sāraṇīya vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ
vāti anicca bhante pe api nu taṃ anupādāya evaṃ diṭṭhi
appiccha pe tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti kathañhi nāma chabbaggiya bhikkhunī
pe rūpa kho bhikkhave sati rūpa upādāya rūpa abhinivissa evaṃ

hoti tathāgata paraṃ maraṇāti vā na hoti tathāgata paraṃ maraṇāti

vācāya paṭivirata hoti pharusa vācāya paṭivirata hoti samphappalāpa paṭivirata hoti
ānanda saddhiṃ sammodi sammodanīya kathaṃ sāraṇīya vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi ekamantaṃ

āyasmant ānanda saddhiṃ sammodi sammodanīya kathaṃ sāraṇīya vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi

hoti pisuṇa vācāya paṭivirata hoti pharusa vācāya paṭivirata hoti samphappalāpa
yā kāci saññā ye keci saṅkhāra yaṃ kiñci viññāṇa atītānāgatapaccuppanna
musāvāda paṭivirata hoti pisuṇa vācāya paṭivirata hoti pharusa vācāya paṭivirata

kiñcāyaṃ purisapuggalo paṭisaṃvedeti sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā sabbaṃ
pañca cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā sotaviññeyyā
niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vāti aniccaṃ bhante pe api nu taṃ
pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati seyyathidaṃ ekampi jātiṃ dvepi jātiyo tissopi jātiyo catassopi
yā kāci saññā ye keci saṅkhārā yaṃ kiñci viññāṇaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ
samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā samaṇesu vā samaṇasammatā brāhmaṇesu vā brāhmaṇasammatā
ca panāyasmanto sāmaññatthañca brahmaññatthañca diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja
evaṃ bhanteti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paccassosi atha kho bhagavā
anussarati seyyathidaṃ ekampi jātiṃ dvepi jātiyo tissopi jātiyo catassopi jātiyo
bhagavāti dhamma pe saṅgha pe ariyakanta sīla samannāgata hoti akhaṇḍa
hetaṃ bhante tasmātihānanda eseva hetu etaṃ nidānaṃ esa samudaya esa
uppāda ṭhiti abhinibbatti pātubhāva dukkhasseso uppāda roga ṭhiti jarāmaraṇa pātubhāva
dhamma sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharanti ye ca kho keci
kāya bheda paraṃ maraṇa apāyaṃ duggati vinipāta niraya upapajjati tathārūpa
taṃ sukhaṃ vāti dukkhaṃ bhante yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhamma api
pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati vimuccati etaṃ santanti passato so kho ahaṃ
sati viññāṇa sati viññāṇa upādāya viññāṇa abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati
sappurisa akkhataṃ anupahata attānaṃ pariharati anavajja ca hoti ananuvajja ca
bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkha ariya aṭṭhaṅgika maggaṃ bhāveti ariya aṭṭhaṅgika maggaṃ bahulīkaroti
sāvatthī viharati jetavana anāthapiṇḍika ārāma tena kho pana samaya sambahula
jāti jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā sambhavati evametassa kevala dukkhakkhandha samudaya hoti
vā patta vā cīvara vā pariyesati sīmā vā sammannati āpatti
tathāgata paraṃ maraṇāti vā hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgata
citta pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati vimuccati etaṃ santanti passato so kho
seyyathāpi gihinī kāmabhoginiyoti assosuṃ kho bhikkhunī tesaṃ manussa ujjhāyanta khiyyanta
ceva samaṇasammatā brāhmaṇa ca brāhmaṇasammatā te ca panāyasmanto sāmaññatthañca brahmaññatthañca
iti kho panetaṃ vutta kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vutta tattha yaṃ jaññā
vā diṭṭheva dhamma sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharanti ye ca
samannāgata sace agāra ajjhāvasati rājā hoti cakkavattī pe rājā samāna
panesā bhante bhagavatā vācā na tāvāhaṃ pāpimant parinibbāyati yāva me
bhante hetu ko paccaya yena midhekacco kāya bheda paraṃ maraṇa

buddha bhagavāti dhamma pe saṅgha pe ariyakanta sīla samannāgata hoti
samaṇa ceva samaṇasammatā brāhmaṇa ca brāhmaṇasammatā te ca panāyasmanto sāmaññatthañca
sāvakasaṅgha sāmīcippaṭipanna bhagavato sāvakasaṅgha yadidaṃ cattāri purisayuga aṭṭha purisapuggala esa
na hoti tathāgata paraṃ maraṇāti vā hoti ca na ca
upasampajja viharati sukha ca pahāna dukkha ca pahāna pubbeva somanassadomanassa
bhikkhu etamatthaṃ ārocesi ye te bhikkhū appiccha pe te ujjhāyanti
ādibrahmacariyika paññāya appaṭiladdha paṭilābha paṭiladdha bhiyyobhāva vepulla bhāvanā pāripūriyā saṃvattati
hoti asallīna upaṭṭhita sati asammuṭṭha sāraddha ca pana me kāyo
vā ācariniṃ vā pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā pariyesati sīmaṃ vā
samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā samaṇesu ceva samaṇasammatā brāhmaṇesu ca brāhmaṇasammatā
bhante bhagavato bhāsitā kho panesā bhante bhagavatā vācā na tāvāhaṃ
hoti asallīnaṃ upaṭṭhitā sati asammuṭṭhā sāraddho ca pana me kāyo
anupahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo ca viññūnaṃ bahuñca
na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā hoti ca na ca
gaṇaṃ vā ācariniṃ vā pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā pariyesati sīmaṃ
ceva raho ca ayampi dhammo sāraṇīyo piyakaraṇo garukaraṇo saṅgahāya avivādāya
bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṃ appiyo ca hoti amanāpo ca agaru ca abhāvanīyo
duccaritaṃ caritvā vācāya duccaritaṃ caritvā manasā duccaritaṃ caritvā kāyassa bhedā
vāti dukkhaṃ bhante yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ api nu taṃ
samannāgato assutavā puthujjano kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ
attānaṃ pariharati anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo ca viññūnaṃ bahuñca puññaṃ
sati asammuṭṭhā sāraddho ca pana me kāyo hoti appaṭippassaddho teneva
jāyati pītimanassa kāyo passambhati passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vediyati sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyati
bhagavāti dhamme pe saṅghe pe ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi
uppādo ṭhiti abhinibbatti pātubhāvo dukkhasseso uppādo rogānaṃ ṭhiti jarāmaraṇassa pātubhāvo
brāhmaṇā vā samaṇesu vā samaṇasammatā brāhmaṇesu vā brāhmaṇasammatā na ca
evaṃ dāruṇo kho bhikkhave lābhasakkārasiloko pe evañhi vo bhikkhave sikkhitabbanti
seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyoti assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ
ācariniṃ vā pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā pariyesati sīmaṃ vā sammannati
vā cīvaraṃ vā pariyesati sīmaṃ vā sammannati āpatti dukkaṭassa ñattiyā
bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho sāmīcippaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho yadidaṃ cattāri purisayugāni aṭṭha purisapuggalā
kāmabhoginiyoti assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ yā
abhikkantaṃ bhante abhikkantaṃ bhante seyyathāpi bhante nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya paṭicchannaṃ
pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu
viññāṇasmimpi nibbindati nibbindaṃ virajjati virāgā vimuccati vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ hoti
maraṇāti vā hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti
diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharanti ye ca kho
no hetaṃ bhante tasmātihānanda eseva hetu etaṃ nidānaṃ esa samudayo
samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ upasampajja viharati paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti
asammuṭṭhā sāraddho ca pana me kāyo hoti appaṭippassaddho teneva dukkhappadhānena
bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkhaṃ ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvessati ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bahulīkarissati
meso attāti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṃ evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya disvā
sammodiṃsu sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho
jāyati pamuditassa pīti jāyati pītimanassa kāyo passambhati passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vedeti
esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho āhuneyyo pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassāti
ca brāhmaṇasammatā te ca panāyasmanto sāmaññatthañca brahmaññatthañca diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ
bhante hetu ko paccayo yena midhekacco kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā
cīvaraṃ vā pariyesati sīmaṃ vā sammannati āpatti dukkaṭassa ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ
ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ
assutavā puthujjano kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ
bhagavato acchariyaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ dhāremi sammukhā metaṃ bhante bhagavato sutaṃ sammukhā
kāyena duccaritaṃ caritvā vācāya duccaritaṃ caritvā manasā duccaritaṃ caritvā kāyassa
caritvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ
saccaṃ bhagavāti vigarahi buddho bhagavā pe kathañhi nāma bhikkhave bhikkhunī
me sāvakā bahū abhiññāvosānapāramippattā viharanti puna caparaṃ udāyi akkhātā mayā
viharati idaṃ kho ānanda etamhā sukhā aññaṃ sukhaṃ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca
paraṃ maraṇāti vā na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā hoti
bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho ujuppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho ñāyappaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho sāmīcippaṭipanno bhagavato
brāhmaṇā vā samaṇesu ceva samaṇasammatā brāhmaṇesu ca brāhmaṇasammatā te ca
natthi mātā natthi pitā natthi sattā opapātikā natthi loke samaṇabrāhmaṇā
pisuṇāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti pharusāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti samphappalāpā paṭivirato
paraṃ maraṇāti vā hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ
nu kho bhante hetu ko paccayo yena midhekacco kāyassa bhedā
caritvā vācāya duccaritaṃ caritvā manasā duccaritaṃ caritvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ
ghānaviññeyyā gandhā jivhāviññeyyā rasā kāyaviññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā
kho panesā bhante bhagavatā vācā na tāvāhaṃ pāpima parinibbāyissāmi yāva
thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca
chabbaggiye bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ pe saccaṃ kira
vā samaṇesu ceva samaṇasammatā brāhmaṇesu ca brāhmaṇasammatā te ca panāyasmanto
vācāya paṭivirato hoti pharusāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti samphappalāpā paṭivirato hoti
pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā pariyesati sīmaṃ vā sammannati āpatti dukkaṭassa
yathā vā paneke bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā saddhādeyyāni bhojanāni bhuñjitvā te evarūpaṃ
uppalāni vā padumāni vā puṇḍarīkāni vā udake jātāni udake saṃvaḍḍhāni
vācāya duccaritaṃ caritvā manasā duccaritaṃ caritvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā
jāti jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā sambhavanti evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti
samaṇo gotamoti iti vā hi bhikkhave puthujjano tathāgatassa vaṇṇaṃ vadamāno
hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā hoti ca na ca hoti
sugate duggate yathākammūpage satte pajānāti ime vata bhonto sattā kāyaduccaritena
bhante bhagavato acchariyaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ dhāremi sammukhā metaṃ bhante bhagavato sutaṃ
agāraṃ ajjhāvasati rājā hoti cakkavattī pe rājā samāno kiṃ labhati
bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho ñāyappaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho sāmīcippaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho yadidaṃ cattāri
bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho yadidaṃ cattāri purisayugāni aṭṭha purisapuggalā esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho
sappuriso akkhataṃ anupahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo ca

kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito hoti otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena

sutasannicayo ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ
yampidaṃ jivhāsamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā
ca viharati na ca kiñci loke upādiyati evampi kho bhikkhave
dhammehi samannāgato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca
sāvakā bahū abhiññāvosānapāramippattā viharanti puna caparaṃ udāyi akkhātā mayā sāvakānaṃ

sāmīcippaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho yadidaṃ cattāri purisayugāni aṭṭha purisapuggalā esa bhagavato
dhammo pakāsito esāhaṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca upāsakaṃ
saggaṃ lokaṃ upapannāti iti dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passati
dubbaṇṇe sugate duggate yathākammūpage satte pajānāti ime vata bhonto sattā
raho ca ayampi dhammo sāraṇīyo piyakaraṇo garukaraṇo saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyā
saddhiṃ sammodiṃsu sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu ekamantaṃ nisinnā
piṇḍapātapaṭikkantā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu ekamantaṃ
ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā so satova assasati
bhikkhave bhikkhu chandasamādhippadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti vīriyasamādhi pe cittasamādhi pe vīmaṃsāsamādhippadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ
saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vāti aniccaṃ bhante pe
pīti jāyati pītimanassa kāyo passambhati passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vediyati sukhino cittaṃ
ñāyappaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho sāmīcippaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho yadidaṃ cattāri purisayugāni aṭṭha
bhikkhu evaṃ paṭipanno hoti no cassa no ca me siyā
acchariyaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ dhāremi sammukhā metaṃ bhante bhagavato sutaṃ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ
ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvessati ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bahulīkarissati kathañca bhikkhave
bhagavato bhāsitā kho panesā bhante bhagavatā vācā na tāvāhaṃ pāpima
suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho ujuppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho ñāyappaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho sāmīcippaṭipanno
ṭhiti abhinibbatti pātubhāvo dukkhasseso uppādo rogānaṃ ṭhiti jarāmaraṇassa pātubhāvo yo
viharati na ca kiñci loke upādiyati evampi kho bhikkhave bhikkhu
viraja vītamala dhammacakkhu udapādi yaṃ kiñci samudayadhamma sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhammanti
idhekacca itthī vā purisa vā aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgata uposatha upavasitvā kāya bheda
appahāya taṃ citta appahāya taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissajjitvā samaṇa gotama sammukhībhāva
jivhāviññeyya rasa kāyaviññeyya phoṭṭhabba iṭṭha kantā manāpa piyarūpa kāmūpasaṃhita rajanīya
citta sarāga cittanti pajānāti vītarāga vā citta vītarāga cittanti pajānāti
tenupasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavant abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi ekamantaṃ nisinna kho mahānāma
ārocesi yā tā bhikkhunī appiccha pe tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti
vācā nela kaṇṇasukha pemanīya hadayaṅgama porī bahujanakanta bahujanamanāpa tathārūpa vācaṃ
piyarūpa kāmūpasaṃhita rajanīya sotaviññeyya sadda pe ghānaviññeyya gandha jivhāviññeyya rasa
rattiṃ tathā divā iti vivaṭa cetasā apariyonaddha sappabhāsa citta bhāveti
bho gotama abhikkantaṃ bho gotama pe upāsaka maṃ bhavaṃ gotama
tehi aññatitthiya paribbājaka saddhiṃ sammodi sammodanīya kathaṃ sāraṇīya vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ
imināhaṃ sīla vā vata vā tapena vā brahmacariya vā deva
sugata lokavidū anuttara purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussā buddha bhagavā so imaṃ
ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā so satova assasati satova
anuttara purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussā buddha bhagavā so imaṃ loka sadevaka
appeva nāma imassa kevala dukkhakkhandha antakiriyā paññāyethāti so evaṃ pabbajita
yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti tassa evaṃ jānato evaṃ passato kāmāsavāpi citta vimuccati
aññatara phalaṃ pāṭikaṅkha diṭṭheva dhamma aññā sati vā upādisesa anāgāmitāti
sotaviññeyya sadda pe ghānaviññeyya gandha jivhāviññeyya rasa kāyaviññeyya phoṭṭhabba iṭṭha
vā brāhmaṇa vā deva vā māra vā brahma vā koci
dvīhi kammavācā dukkaṭa kammavācāpariyosāna upajjhāyāya āpatti pācittiya gaṇa ca ācarinī
pāthikaputta taṃ vācaṃ appahāya taṃ citta appahāya taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissajjitvā
sāmaññattha vā brahmaññatthaṃ vā diṭṭheva dhamma sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja
tathārūpāssa dhamma bahussuta honti dhātā vacasā paricita manasānupekkhita diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdha
tampi niccaṃ vā anicca vāti anicca bhante yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ
attānukkaṃseti paraṃ vambheti ayampi bhikkhave asappurisadhamma sappurisa ca kho bhikkhave
dhammadhara dhammānudhammappaṭipanna sāmīcippaṭipanna anudhammacārī saka ācariyaka uggahetvā ācikkhati deseti paññapeti
tenupasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā tehi aññatitthiya paribbājaka saddhiṃ sammodi sammodanīya kathaṃ sāraṇīya
kammavācāpariyosāna upajjhāyāya āpatti pācittiya gaṇa ca ācarinī ca āpatti dukkaṭa
sarāga vā citta sarāga cittanti pajānāti vītarāga vā citta vītarāga
bhikkhu hetu ayaṃ paccaya yena midhekacco kāya bheda paraṃ maraṇa
tatra ca pana me sāvaka bahū abhiññāvosānapāramippattā viharanti puna caparaṃ
sammukhībhāva āgantuṃ sacepissa evamassa ahaṃ taṃ vācaṃ appahāya taṃ citta
paṭicca rūpa ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phassa phassapaccayā vedanā
ahaṃ taṃ vācaṃ appahāya taṃ citta appahāya taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissajjitvā
vata vā tapena vā brahmacariya vā deva vā bhavati devaññatara
kho bhikkhu hetu ayaṃ paccaya yena midhekacco kāya bheda paraṃ
ca ayampi dhamma sāraṇīya piyakaraṇa garukaraṇa saṅgaha avivāda sāmaggiyā ekībhāva
vambheti ayampi bhikkhave asappurisadhamma sappurisa ca kho bhikkhave iti paṭisañcikkhati
aṭṭhaṅgika maggo seyyathidaṃ sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappa sammāvācā sammākammanta sammāājīva sammāvāyāma sammāsati
yathā rattiṃ tathā divā iti vivaṭa cetasā apariyonaddha sappabhāsa citta
kammavācā dukkaṭa kammavācāpariyosāna upajjhāyāya āpatti pācittiya gaṇa ca ācarinī ca
paneke bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā saddhādeyya bhojana bhuñjitvā te evarūpa tiracchānavijjā micchājīva
tenupasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavant abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi ekamantaṃ nisinna kho anāthapiṇḍika
vijjati yaṃ idhekacca itthī vā purisa vā aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgata uposatha upavasitvā
etamatthaṃ ārocesi yā tā bhikkhunī appiccha pe tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti
bhikkhu arahaṃ khīṇāsava vusitavant katakaraṇīya ohitabhāra anuppattasadattha parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojana sammadaññā vimutta
pe yampidaṃ diṭṭha sutaṃ muta viññāta patta pariyesita anuvicarita manasā
dukkhotiṇṇa dukkhapareta appeva nāma imassa kevala dukkhakkhandha antakiriyā paññāyethāti so
yā ratti vā divasa vā āgacchati vuddhiyeva pāṭikaṅkha kusalesu dhamma
muditāsahagata cetasā pe upekkhāsahagata cetasā eka disaṃ pharitvā viharati tathā
satthā devamanussā buddha bhagavā so imaṃ loka sadevaka samāraka sabrahmaka
cetasā pe upekkhāsahagata cetasā eka disaṃ pharitvā viharati tathā dutiyaṃ
idha bhikkhave bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusala dhamma savitakka savicāra
rūpa niccaṃ vā anicca vāti anicca bhante yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ
sīmā vā sammannati āpatti dukkaṭa ñatti dukkaṭa dvīhi kammavācā dukkaṭa
yaṃ idhekacca itthī vā purisa vā aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgata uposatha upavasitvā kāya

avahari tassa kukkucca ahosi pe āpatti tvaṃ bhikkhu āpanna pārājikanti

vā tapena vā brahmacariya vā deva vā bhavati devaññatara vāti

sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ abhivadanti tathārūpāssa dhammā bahussutā honti dhātā
kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā sotaviññeyyā saddā pe ghānaviññeyyā gandhā
ye keci saṅkhārā yaṃ kiñci viññāṇaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā
lokaṃ upekkhāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena pharitvā viharati
bhikkhū dhāressantīti tena hi bhikkhave suṇātha sādhukaṃ manasi karotha bhāsissāmīti
upapannāti iti dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passati cavamāne upapajjamāne
upādānapaccayā bhavo bhavapaccayā jāti jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā sambhavanti evametassa kevalassa
ayaṃ kho bhikkhu hetu ayaṃ paccayo yena midhekacco kāyassa bhedā
pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ abhivadanti tathārūpāssa dhammā bahussutā
tathārūpāssa dhammā bahussutā honti dhātā vacasā paricitā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā
tena hi bhikkhave suṇātha sādhukaṃ manasi karotha bhāsissāmīti evaṃ bhanteti
saññā ye keci saṅkhārā yaṃ kiñci viññāṇaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ vā
sammukhībhāvaṃ āgantuṃ sacepissa evamassa ahaṃ taṃ vācaṃ appahāya taṃ cittaṃ
sakko yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi ekamantaṃ
rūpaṃ attato samanupassati rūpavantaṃ vā attānaṃ attani vā rūpaṃ rūpasmiṃ
attato samanupassati viññāṇavantaṃ vā attānaṃ attani vā viññāṇaṃ viññāṇasmiṃ vā
pariharati sāvajjo ca hoti sānuvajjo ca viññūnaṃ bahuñca apuññaṃ pasavati
sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavā so imaṃ
āpatti dukkaṭassa ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ dvīhi kammavācāhi dukkaṭā kammavācāpariyosāne upajjhāyāya āpatti
samaṇabrāhmaṇā saddhādeyyāni bhojanāni bhuñjitvā te evarūpāya tiracchānavijjāya micchājīvena jīvitaṃ kappenti
itthī vā puriso vā aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ uposathaṃ upavasitvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ
kammavācāhi dukkaṭā kammavācāpariyosāne upajjhāyāya āpatti pācittiyassa gaṇassa ca ācariniyā ca
dvīhi kammavācāhi dukkaṭā kammavācāpariyosāne upajjhāyāya āpatti pācittiyassa gaṇassa ca ācariniyā
kāci saññā ye keci saṅkhārā yaṃ kiñci viññāṇaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ
buddho bhagavā so imaṃ lokaṃ sadevakaṃ samārakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṃ pajaṃ
keci saṅkhārā yaṃ kiñci viññāṇaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā
dukkaṭassa ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ dvīhi kammavācāhi dukkaṭā kammavācāpariyosāne upajjhāyāya āpatti pācittiyassa
lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavā so imaṃ lokaṃ
vā puriso vā aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ uposathaṃ upavasitvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā
dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti abhikkamosānaṃ paññāyati no paṭikkamo seyyathāpi
ratti vā divaso vā āgacchati vuddhiyeva pāṭikaṅkhā kusalesu dhammesu no
vijjati yaṃ idhekacco itthī vā puriso vā aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ uposathaṃ upavasitvā
manasā duccaritaṃ caritvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ
paneke bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā saddhādeyyāni bhojanāni bhuñjitvā te evarūpāya tiracchānavijjāya micchājīvena
gotama abhikkantaṃ bho gotama pe upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu
yathā rattiṃ tathā divā iti vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena sappabhāsaṃ cittaṃ
tampi niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vāti aniccaṃ bhante yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ
ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā so satova assasati satova
samanupassati rūpavantaṃ vā attānaṃ attani vā rūpaṃ rūpasmiṃ vā attānaṃ
attato samanupassati rūpavantaṃ vā attānaṃ attani vā rūpaṃ rūpasmiṃ vā
aññataraṃ phalaṃ pāṭikaṅkhaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme aññā sati vā upādisese anāgāmitāti
sacepissa evamassa ahaṃ taṃ vācaṃ appahāya taṃ cittaṃ appahāya taṃ
saddhādeyyāni bhojanāni bhuñjitvā te evarūpāya tiracchānavijjāya micchājīvena jīvitaṃ kappenti seyyathidaṃ
jivhāviññeyyā rasā kāyaviññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā
dukkaṭaṃ dvīhi kammavācāhi dukkaṭā kammavācāpariyosāne upajjhāyāya āpatti pācittiyassa gaṇassa ca
so sudaṃ aṭṭassaraṃ karoti pe eso bhikkhave satto imasmiṃyeva rājagahe
yathā vā paneke bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā saddhādeyyāni bhojanāni bhuñjitvā te evarūpāya
devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavā so imaṃ lokaṃ sadevakaṃ samārakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṃ
vā tapena vā brahmacariyena vā devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vāti
dukkaṭā kammavācāpariyosāne upajjhāyāya āpatti pācittiyassa gaṇassa ca ācariniyā ca āpatti
sammannati āpatti dukkaṭassa ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ dvīhi kammavācāhi dukkaṭā kammavācāpariyosāne upajjhāyāya
anekavihitāni diṭṭhigatāni loke uppajjanti sassato lokoti vā asassato lokoti vā
sīlena vā vatena vā tapena vā brahmacariyena vā devo vā
taṃ vācaṃ appahāya taṃ cittaṃ appahāya taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissajjitvā samaṇassa
majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ abhivadanti tathārūpāssa dhammā
rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vāti aniccaṃ bhante yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ
iti dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passati cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne
attānukkaṃseti paraṃ vambheti ayampi bhikkhave asappurisadhammo sappuriso ca kho bhikkhave
bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā saddhādeyyāni bhojanāni bhuñjitvā te evarūpāya tiracchānavijjāya micchājīvena jīvitaṃ
